--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "doomlordx" <doomlordx@y...> wrote:
> > 4th attack = resurrect character / reincarinate character
> 
> One question. How exactly would Reincarnate Character work? I see 
> little difference between that and Ressurect.

Big difference: resurrect brings your teammates back in the same 
character class they were originally in and brings opponents back as 
ghosts.  Reincarnate brings characters (both teammates and opponents) 
back from the dead in a random character class.

Suppose an image from an opponent archmage was killed.  Normally, I 
could only bring it back as either a skeleton or a ghost.  With 
reincarnate,  I could bring that image back as anything.
